page.title: 18Graham A Publican
page.content: Mr.Morgan has lived in the Horse Shoe Inn for just over two years.It is not owned by a brewery.He owns it himself. The pub has won an award for the best pub in the Vale.He is very proud of his success. The pub was built in the early 1900s. Mr.and Mrs.Bishop owned the pub before the Morgans.The pub opens for business at 11.30a.m.to 3.30p.m.It reopens at 5.30p.m.to 11.00p.m.The quietest day is Thursday and the busiest is Sunday. The premises and car park cover about one third of an acre.The strongest drink that he sells is EKU.It is the strongest beer in the World.Mr Morgan arranges entertainment for his customers.He also has a pool table.His customers are fond of his dog which has only one eye.Mr.Morgan is very pleasant and kind.He answered all our questions.
